mapper.select: select b.ship_info, b.ship_num, a.receiver, a.receiver_tel, concat(concat(a.order_pcode,a.order_addr),a.order_detail) ship_addr, a.order_msg, b.man_name, b.man_tel, b.ship_date, c.pro_idx, c.pro_amount from orders a, shipping b, order_pro c where a.order_idx=b.order_idx and b.order_idx=c.order_idx
